If you all are so strongly against this documentary,  then
1. Don't buy/pay for it! If you know it's all lies, and you think that
this Hayes should not be earning money from this, then don't give him your
money.
2. Encourage people not to see this documentary. But, do not simply tell
them "It's all lies....Hayes is a fraud" because they will not take so
seriously an extreme point of view as a more moderate one.
3. Create your own documentary. If you want this documentary to not be
taken seriously and you want people to know the correct information, then
create a documentary with the correct information. Talking among ourselves
about how much of a fraud Hayes is does not solve the problem that this
documentary is out there and spreading inferior information.

Daniel Zollman
